mapper.select: select * from partnership order by bno desc
mapper.insert: insert into partnership (writer, title, content, pwtype, pw) values(#{writer},#{title},#{content},#{pwtype}, #{pw})
mapper.update: update partnership set writer=#{writer}, title=#{title}, content=#{content} where bno=#{bno}
update partnership set cnt=(cnt+1) where bno=#{bno}
update partnership set state='완료' where bno=#{bno}
update partnership set state='대기' where bno=#{bno}
update partnership set replycnt = replycnt + #{amount} where bno = #{bno}
mapper.select: select * from partnership order by bno desc, regdate desc limit #{pageStart},#{perPageNum}
